Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the resource name.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The connection endpoint for the database. For example: mystack-mydb-1apw1j4phylrk.cg034hpkmmjt.us-east-2.rds.amazonaws.com.
The port number on which the database accepts connections. For example:  8182.
